The avatar is at (10, 13). There are citizens spawning at (12, 1) and (12, 2). The goal is to survive 1000 time units without any cursed sprites. Angels and demons are at the top of the map. There are boxes scattered around. The output is on the bottom right corner, the input is on the bottom left.
